# Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement


## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-6763-94034458
* **Tender Solicitation Number**: 23-58037/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-27
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-18T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## tender Classifications and Categories Background

* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and several others

## Scope of Work

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC-CNRC) requires a Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) requirement for the delivery of Research Altitude Test Facility Upgrades. The required services include the assistance of an experienced electrical engineer to support the technical lead in delivering the upgrades.

## Details of Services Required

* **Type of Services**: Technical, Engineering, and Maintenance Services
* **Level of Effort**: Estimated 253 days over 12 months
* **Security Level Required**: Protected B (Company and Resource)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Paul Hewitt
* **Phone Number**: (343) 573-1068
* **Email**: paul.hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* **Post Office Address**: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R6, Canada


Please Note: This is a competitive tendering process. Only a limited number of pre-selected suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal. The TSPS Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers can be qualified as "Qualified SA Holders" only by contacting SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.
